sourcesContent:
<script>
import { computed } from 'vue'
import { useRoute } from 'vue-router'

export default {
  name: 'AppSidebar',
  setup() {
    const route = useRoute()

    // 菜单配置（第二层级）- 根据PDF和接口文档重新设计
    const menuConfig = {
      teaching: [
        {
          name: '教学管理',
          children: [
            { name: '考勤管理', path: '/student/attendance' },
            { name: '作业管理', path: '/student/homework' },
            { name: '作业详情', path: '/student/homeworkdetail' },
            { name: '成绩查询', path: '/student/grade' }, 
            { name: '课程资源', path: '/student/classresource' }, 
            { name: '请假管理', path: '/student/leave' },
          ]
        }
      ],
      resource: [
        {
          name: '资源管理',
          children: [
            { name: '教室预约', path: '/student/classroom' },
            { name: '书籍借阅', path: '/student/library' }
          ]
        }
      ],
    }

    // 计算当前模块的菜单
    const currentMenuGroups = computed(() => {
      const path = route.path
      
      // 教学管理路由
      if (path.startsWith('/student/attendance') ||
          path.startsWith('/student/homework') ||
          path.startsWith('/student/homeworkdetail') ||
          path.startsWith('/student/grade') || // 修正：grade 不是 grades
          path.startsWith('/student/classresource') || // 修正：classresource 不是 resources
          path.startsWith('/student/leave')) {
        return menuConfig.teaching
      } 
      // 资源管理路由
      else if (path.startsWith('/student/classroom') ||
               path.startsWith('/student/library')) {
        return menuConfig.resource
      }

      return []
    })

    // 计算当前模块标题
    const currentModuleTitle = computed(() => {
      const path = route.path
      
      if (path.startsWith('/student/attendance') ||
          path.startsWith('/student/homework') ||
          path.startsWith('/student/homeworkdetail') ||
          path.startsWith('/student/grade') ||
          path.startsWith('/student/classresource') ||
          path.startsWith('/student/leave')) {
        return '教学管理'
      } else if (path.startsWith('/student/classroom') ||
                 path.startsWith('/student/library')) {
        return '资源管理'
      }
      return '功能菜单'
    })

    // 检查菜单项是否激活
    const isItemActive = (item) => {
      return route.path === item.path || route.path.startsWith(item.path + '/')
    }

    return {
      currentMenuGroups,
      currentModuleTitle,
      isItemActive
    }
  }
}
</script>
